title: Amanda Anisimova
summary: Amanda Anisimova (/əˈnɪsɪmoʊvə/ ə-NIS-ih-moh-və;[1]  born August 31, 2001) is an American professional tennis player. She is the third-youngest player ranked in the top 100 by the Women's Tennis Association (WTA) and has a career-high ranking of No. 21 in the world. Anisimova won her first WTA title at the Copa Colsanitas in April 2019 at the age of 17.
